Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.netflix.genie.client.ApplicationClient.getApplications(String, String, List<String>, List<String>, String)
    Use ApplicationClient.getApplications(String, String, List, List, String, Integer, SortAttribute, SortDirection, Integer)
    com.netflix.genie.web.scripts.GroovyScriptUtils.getClusters(Binding)
    Use GroovyScriptUtils.getClusterSelectionContext(Binding) or GroovyScriptUtils.getCommandSelectionContext(Binding) instead
    com.netflix.genie.client.ClusterClient.getClusters(String, List<String>, List<String>, Long, Long)
    Use ClusterClient.getClusters(String, List, List, Long, Long, Integer, SortAttribute, SortDirection, Integer)
    com.netflix.genie.web.scripts.GroovyScriptUtils.getCommands(Binding)
    Use GroovyScriptUtils.getClusterSelectionContext(Binding) or GroovyScriptUtils.getCommandSelectionContext(Binding) instead
    com.netflix.genie.client.CommandClient.getCommands(String, String, List<String>, List<String>)
    Use CommandClient.getCommands(String, String, List, List, Integer, SortAttribute, SortDirection, Integer)
    com.netflix.genie.client.JobClient.getJobs(String, String, String, Set<String>, Set<String>, String, String, String, String, Long, Long, Long, Long)
    com.netflix.genie.client.JobClient.getJobs(String, String, String, Set<String>, Set<String>, String, String, String, String, Long, Long, Long, Long, String, String)
    Use JobClient.getJobs(String, String, String, Set, Set, String, String, String, String, Long, Long, Long, Long, String, String, Integer, SortAttribute, SortDirection, Integer)
    com.netflix.genie.web.data.services.PersistenceService.getV3JobRequest(String)
    com.netflix.genie.web.data.services.impl.jpa.JpaPersistenceServiceImpl.getV3JobRequest(String)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.JobRequest.Builder.withCommandArgs(String)
    Use JobRequest.Builder.withCommandArgs(List)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.Job.Builder.withCommandArgs(String)
    See Job.Builder.withCommandArgs(List)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.Command.Builder.withExecutable(String)
    this setter is provided transitionally to make both 'executable' and 'executableAndArguments' optional for API backward compatibility. The proper way to construct a Command is via the constructor #Builder(String, String, String, CommandStatus, List, long).
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.Command.Builder.withExecutableAndArguments(List<String>)
    this setter is provided transitionally to make both 'executable' and 'executableAndArguments' optional for API backward compatibility. The proper way to construct a Command is via the constructor #Builder(String, String, String, CommandStatus, List, long).
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.netflix.genie.client.ApplicationClient(String, List<Interceptor>, GenieNetworkConfiguration)
    Use ApplicationClient.ApplicationClient(Retrofit)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.Command.Builder(String, String, String, CommandStatus, String, long)
    Use #Builder(String, String, String, CommandStatus, List, long)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.Job.Builder(String, String, String, String)
    com.netflix.genie.common.dto.JobRequest.Builder(String, String, String, String, List<ClusterCriteria>, Set<String>)
    Use #Builder(String, String, String, List, Set)
    com.netflix.genie.client.ClusterClient(String, List<Interceptor>, GenieNetworkConfiguration)
    Use ClusterClient.ClusterClient(Retrofit)
    com.netflix.genie.client.CommandClient(String, List<Interceptor>, GenieNetworkConfiguration)
    Use CommandClient.CommandClient(Retrofit)
    com.netflix.genie.client.JobClient(String, List<Interceptor>, GenieNetworkConfiguration)
    Use JobClient.JobClient(Retrofit, int)
